```{=html}
<script>
window.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  const toggles = document.querySelectorAll(".misc-expand-toggle");

  const collapseCard = (card) => {
    const btn = card.querySelector(".misc-expand-toggle");
    card.classList.remove("expanded");
    if (btn) {
      btn.textContent = "Expand";
      btn.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "false");
    }
  };

  toggles.forEach((btn) => {
    btn.addEventListener("click", function () {
      const card = btn.closest(".misc-card");
      if (!card) return;

      const alreadyExpanded = card.classList.contains("expanded");
      document.querySelectorAll(".misc-card.expanded").forEach((openCard) => {
        if (openCard !== card) collapseCard(openCard);
      });

      if (alreadyExpanded) {
        collapseCard(card);
      } else {
        card.classList.add("expanded");
        btn.textContent = "Collapse";
        btn.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "true");
      }
    });
  });
});
</script>
```
